name: Scope
text:
ARTICLE 9A
PRODUCER LICENSING
 
Cross References
 
  Bail agents; sureties, see article 9N.
 
[PART I.  GENERAL PROVISIONS]
 
Revision Note
 
  Part I designation added by revisor pursuant to L 2002, c 235, §4.
 
     §431:9A-101  Scope.  This article governs qualifications and procedures for the licensing of insurance producers.  It simplifies and organizes statutory language to improve efficiency, to permit the use of new technology, and to reduce costs associated with issuing and renewing insurance licenses. [L 2001, c 216, pt of §2; am L 2003, c 212, §55; am L 2006, c 154, §22]
